entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ``ILGenerator`` does not properly handle function pointers #111003
  • Adding multiple HttpClients with same Interface results in conflicting configurations #110996
  • .net8 String.IndexOf crash #110994
  • Test failure: Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Internal.HostTests.HostLifetimeOnStartedCanBeCancelled #110988
    10.0.0

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Reflecting to find nullability of a generic return type is unreasonably complicated #110971
  • Unobserved ObjectDisposedException when reading HTTPS stream #110998

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: Add TSPLIB dump capabilities to block layout #111005
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Experimental PR to compare TP #111004
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove unused packageindex infra #111002
    area-Infrastructure
  • [mono] [llvm-aot] Fixed storing Vector3 into memory #111000
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Fix conflicting HttpClient configs #110999
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, community-contribution

Merged

  • [S390x] Fix endian bug in minipal #110985
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Fix code style in ProductVersionInfoGenerator.cs #110997
    needs-area-label
  • Use correct product version in SPC in servicing #110980
    area-System.Runtime

Updated

  • Add lock in ValidateName #110780
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Observe any exception on HTTP connection scavenge. #110982
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Build the "in build" crossgen2 into a pack that we can use within the VMR #110676
    area-Infrastructure
  • Revert "Fix NativeAOT ThunksPool thunk data block size handling." #110983
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [JIT] [APX] Enable additional General Purpose Registers. #108799
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx, 10.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Vsix explorer does not show code issues in updated Microsoft.CodeAnalysis #76589
  • Bad error report when using uninitialized variable in a local function: "Use of possibly unassigned field '_dummyPrimitive'" #76586
  • API Proposal: `IncrementalGeneratorPostInitializationContext.AddEmbeddedAttributeDefinition` #76584
  • Can not suppress warnings and can not proceed with build #76581

PullRequests

Created

  • Forbid unsafe types in records #76588
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Cleanup Extract method code (part 3) #76587
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Continued Extract method cleanup (part 2) #76585
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add EmbeddedAttribute API for source generators #76583
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review
  • Reproduce and fix 'Use expression body' indenting new expression body oddly #76582
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode

Updated

  • Propagate marked attributes to synthesized fields. #76567
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Allow users to define EmbeddedAttribute #76523
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Language Feature Status.md: correct dictionary expressions entries #76574
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Document breaks due to preferring ReadOnlySpan over Span #76572
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged, Feature - First-class Span Types
  • CSharpIndentationService simplification #76580
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Warning: observer object was not disposed manually with Dispose() and Missing Dispose call on local IDisposable (cs/local-not-disposed) #26871
  • .NET MAUI does not show in Visual Studio #26870
  • Svg rasterizes empty transparent png if it has height/width specified in em units #26869
  • Error in InitializeComponent() System.IO.FileNotFoundException: '' When starting an application #26866
  • Shell Content Title Not Rendering in Full-Screen Mode on Mac Catalyst #26864
  • [iOS] CarouselView with CarouselViewHandler2 make app crash when Loop="False" and user scroll to the last position #26863
  • Dark/light theme button is not accessible using the keyboard: A11y_.NET 9 template_.NET 9 template_Project_Keyboard. #26862
    .NET 9 SR4
  • Project option is not accessible using the keyboard: A11y_.NET 9 template_.NET 9 template_Project_Keyboard. #26861
    .NET 9 SR4
  • Tags are not accessible using the keyboard: A11y_.NET 9 template_.NET 9 template_Project_Keyboard. #26860
    .NET 9 SR4
  • Error building with XCODE 16.1 #26859
  • [Windows] FileResult(string fullPath) not initialized properly #26858
  • ListView ScrollTo position always remains at the start even when set to Center or End #26857
  • `MenuFlyoutItem`s programmatically added to `MenuFlyoutSubItem`s are not visible. #26856

Closed

  • Statusbar color changes when opening a modal page on Android #26867
  • Confusing MAUI Build Warning #26855
  • MAUI .NET9.0 does not build, getting lots of errors VS17.12.3 #26688

PullRequests

Created

  • [iOS] CarouselView with CarouselViewHandler2 make app crash when Loop="False" and user scroll to the last position - fix #26868
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, collectionview-cv2
  • [Windows] Fixed the exception when using CarouselView PeekAreaInsets Property in OnSizeAllocated method #26865
    community ✨

Merged

  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 64 #26823
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion

Updated

  • [Windows] Tap Events Incorrectly passed Through Button - fix #26834
    platform/windows 🪟, p/0, community ✨, area-gestures, .NET 9 SR3
  • Fix ScrollToPosition.Center behavior in ScrollView on iOS and MacCatalyst #26825
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 62 #26805
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix for Setting Window.TitleBar to null does not remove the customization  #26568
    community ✨, area-controls-titlebar, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR3
  • Fixed Header and Footer template is not visible in CollectionView #26844
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
